overview: PEZheads - The Movie is a documentary about PEZ速 and PEZ速 Collectors. It explores the phenomenon of PEZ速 collecting through interviews with a variety of collectors and vendors, as well as visits to conventions, the PEZ factory, flea markets, and anywhere else we can find PEZ速.  This documentary highlights the fun and quirky aspects of the hobby, as well as the community and the friendships that develop around it. It explores the PEZ phenomonon from the viewpoint of non-collectors and collectors alike, as well as collectors' families and friends.
title: PEZheads - The Movie
